INSERT INTO t_security_ctlg (ctlg_cd, ctlg_itm_cd, ctlg_itm_ctnt, stdd_yn, prtcuse_frqc) VALUES( #ctlg_cd#, #ctlg_itm_cd#, #ctlg_itm_ctnt#, 'N', '0' ) ON DUPLICATE KEY UPDATE ctlg_cd=ctlg_cd
